message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a unique item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $15000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $12000 for it. Looking forward to your response.
